DOC.brief_title: Study To Assess The Effect Of PF-04531083 On Heat Pain In Healthy Volunteers With Ultraviolet Light Sensitized Skin
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer . Body mass index 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 body weight great 50 kg . Subjects condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication . Subjects inadequate cardiac function ( ECG demonstrate prolonged QTc interval screen ) . Subjects inadequate excessive sensitivity UVB light .
